name: Cloaked Kingdom
description:
The Bat Infestation is threatening to take over the Goblin Kingdom. In order to eliminate the bats and take back our lands a hero bearing the lost sword must venture into the caverns and defeat the Bat King! However to defeat the Bat King the hero must be illustriously stealthy using the signature Goblin camoflauge cloak to retrieve the sword! Only then will he be able to defeat the Bat King, destroy the Bat Infestation and restore peace and order to our Cloaked Kingdom!

Details:

This was a VERY short(12 rooms) Metroidvania game made for the BenBonk game jam #4 in Bevy and Rust. It was a super fun and unique experience creating the game in Bevy and Rust. If your performance is a bit low maybe download the Desktop version, on web my performance is around 130 fps while on Desktop I get around 500.

Controls: 

WD to move horizontally

W,SPACE,or UP arrow to Jump or interact/pickup items

WASD, Arrow Keys, or SPACE to climb ladders

Q or X to put on cloak

Z,RMB,or LMB to use Sword
